title: Playfab Help Tool w/ Template
description: Set up Playfab account server for your game in just a couple minutes
longDescription:
This package handles account creation, account recovery, account login, leaderboard retrieval, and currency retrieval from a playfab server. There is an included level and sample UI that will let you get going and test your playfab server in under 60 seconds. ALSO included is my Virtual Keyboard for Gamepad V2 blueprint asset. Try out your gamepad in my test level to see that functionality, or just click the keyboard buttons. The purpose of this asset is to get you up and going quickly, and provide a template to show you how to work with the PlayfabAPI for additional functions.


HOW TO USE -

  1. Install Playfab SDK to your engine version and enable it in your plugin settings for your project.
  2. Open project settings -> Maps & Modes -> Set game instance to GI_PlayfabInstance OR Spawn a PlayfabHelpTool in your own game instance and create a reference variable to it. Alternatively, reparent your custom game instance to GI_PlayfabInstance and call the ParentBeginPlay.
  3. Set launch level and opening level to PlayfabMenuLevel OR display my UI from your own level.

For a more custom implementation, you can of course build on my UI and game instance, or simply plug in the 'PFHT' events from the PlayfabHelpTool class into your UI as appropriate.


DEMO/GUIDE - https://youtu.be/Q_CTXVKFVcY

SUPPORT: https://discord.gg/F4Yg2e5XVR | isaacgfarr@live.com
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Easy to use

Number of Blueprints: 9 (PlayfabHelpTool blueprint + TestUI widget + blueprints from Virtual Keyboard for Gamepad V2)

Input: Mouse, Keyboard, Gamepad

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
